Package chess

Class BoardGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
chess.BoardGUI
public class BoardGUI
extends javafx.application.Application
This class creates the GUI application for a chess game.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Seth Steinbrook and Getty Muthiani
